entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Rankin Inlet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:27 PM CST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -36.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rankin Inlet Airport 12:00 AM CST Saturday 11 February 2023
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -36.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -57
Dewpoint: -40.0°C
Wind: NNW 44 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this evening then clearing. Blowing snow. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 45 this evening and minus 58 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Blowing snow. High minus 34.
entry.summary: Sunny. Blowing snow in the morning. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 34. Wind chill minus 58 in the morning and minus 45 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 38. Wind chill near minus 49. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 27.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 27. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 27. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Friday 10 February 2023
